segments.text: What are we going to eat for dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to cook anything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't plan on cooking tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're hungry , then cook something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know what to make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me what you want to eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been craving chicken and potatoes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to cook it tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm really not going to cook tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you start cooking then ?
segments.speaker: S2
